mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.huanzhe_id as huanzheId ,a.zhiliaoxinxi_uuid_number as zhiliaoxinxiUuidNumber ,a.ganranyuan as ganranyuan ,a.zhongzheng_types as zhongzhengTypes ,a.zhuyuan_time as zhuyuanTime ,a.fabing_zhengzhuang as fabingZhengzhuang ,a.zhenzhiyiyuan as zhenzhiyiyuan ,a.hesuanjiance_text as hesuanjianceText ,a.ctjiance_text as ctjianceText ,a.zhiliaoxinxi_content as zhiliaoxinxiContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,huanzhe.huanzhe_name as huanzheName ,huanzhe.huanzhe_phone as huanzhePhone ,huanzhe.huanzhe_id_number as huanzheIdNumber ,huanzhe.huanzhe_photo as huanzhePhoto ,huanzhe.sex_types as sexTypes ,huanzhe.huanzhe_email as huanzheEmail ,huanzhe.huanzhe_zhuzhi as huanzheZhuzhi
FROM zhiliaoxinxi a left JOIN huanzhe huanzhe ON a.huanzhe_id = huanzhe.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.huanzhe_id = #{params.huanzheId} )
and a.zhiliaoxinxi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiliaoxinxiUuidNumber},'%')
and a.ganranyuan like CONCAT('%',#{params.ganranyuan},'%')
and a.zhongzheng_types = #{params.zhongzhengTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.zhuyuan_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.zhuyuanTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.zhuyuan_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.zhuyuanTimeEnd})
and a.fabing_zhengzhuang like CONCAT('%',#{params.fabingZhengzhuang},'%')
and a.zhenzhiyiyuan like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhenzhiyiyuan},'%')
and a.hesuanjiance_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.hesuanjianceText},'%')
and a.ctjiance_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.ctjianceText},'%')
and a.zhiliaoxinxi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiliaoxinxiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.huanzhe_id IS NOT NULL
and huanzhe.huanzhe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheName},'%')
and huanzhe.huanzhe_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzhePhone},'%')
and huanzhe.huanzhe_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheIdNumber},'%')
and huanzhe.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and huanzhe.huanzhe_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheEmail},'%')
and huanzhe.huanzhe_zhuzhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanzheZhuzhi},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(huanzhe.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(huanzhe.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
